byline.contributor: Melissa Eddy contributed reporting from Berlin, and Palko Karasz from London.

abstract: Police continue to investigate 71 deaths of migrants found on truck in Austria, as fifth person is arrested in case; authorities consider stopping cars at Austria-Hungary border to search for human cargo, but smugglers appear to suspect trap and have begun avoiding border.
lead_paragraph: While investigators in Austria continued inspecting the truck in which 71 migrants died last week, officials grappled with how to address the flow of migrants.

headline.main: As Police Investigate Deaths in Truck, Migrants and Smugglers Appear to Shift Tactics
headline.print_headline: As Police Investigate 71 Deaths in Austria, Smugglers Appear to Shift Their Tactics

snippet: While investigators in Austria continued inspecting the truck in which 71 migrants died last week, officials grappled with how to address the flow of migrants.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
